summary: Make two of my favorite follower Aela & illia more pleasing to the eye.
descriptionHtml:
Dark face bug : for u guys experiencing this, it is because conflict between XCE and your body mod, to solve this : don\'t use XCE, use only face texture compatible with your body mod.

Newest file version 1.1 include illia rehire fix script.
This is a simple mod, i edited a bit aela and illia face to my liking without altering to much from the original.
The mod is in separate files, if you want to use only aela or illia facelift, just delete the esp and bsa files you don\'t want to use.
Please endorse if you like it!

INSTALLATION :
extract to your skyrim Data folder

IMPORTANT :
make sure the .esp load order is placed under any follower mod or you can place it at the bottom of all your mod. 
If you\'re using any face texture mod they may look different.

REQUIREMENT :
ApachiiSkyHair http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168 (illia ONLY)
(NOTE: ApachiiSkyHair for illia hair already included in the mod, if you are not installing ApachiiSkyHair, i don\'t know if there will have bug or not)
If you want aela and illia just look like in my screenshot, i\'m using XCE mod

OPTIONAL :
If you want to make illia using triss armor like in my screenshot.. 
Triss Armor Retextured by Psyke23 and oldholo http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4708
And any tradeable follower equipment mod.. like UFO or TCG.

Please inform me if you find any bug in this mod.

Check out my other mods :
Better Jordis - Facelift
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19413
Better Mjoll - Facelift
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19366

Credit to : 
Foretrenty for his Skyrim NPC Editor the tool i used to make this mod.
Apachii for his awesome ApachiiSkyHair mod.
Xenius for his XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement mod.
Whoever the owner of illia rehire fix script.
All mod owner mentioned in optional mod.

Hope you like it as i do!
author: leofj

files.name: Aela and Illia include illia rehire fix
